content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = N'Dim' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [Dim]');
GO
--GRANT CONTROL ON SCHEMA :: Dim TO binkuksouthprodsynapse;

IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = N'Fact' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [Fact]');
GO
--GRANT CONTROL ON SCHEMA :: Fact TO binkuksouthprodsynapse;

IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = N'Ctl' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [Ctl]');
GO

IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = N'Err' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [Err]');
GO

IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = N'Rpt' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [Rpt]');
GO

IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = N'Mdm' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [Mdm]');
GO
